tests.name: coverage
tests.setup: sudo apt-get install software-properties-common >/dev/null; sudo apt-get update >/dev/null; sudo apt-get install python3.8 >/dev/null; sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/python python /usr/bin/python3.8 1 >/dev/null; sudo -H pip install coverage >/dev/null
tests.run: python -m coverage run -p hash_quad_tests.py 2>/dev/null; python -m coverage run -p concordance_tests.py 2>/dev/null; python -m coverage combine; python -m coverage report -m --fail-under=100

tests.name: type check
tests.run: echo "mypy type check"; mypy --disallow-untyped-defs --python-version 3.8 concordance.py concordance_tests.py
